title: "WhatsApp is working on a new transcription feature for voice notes - but the messages will be sent to Apple to be processed and to help 'improve its speech recognition technology'"
excerpt: "WhatsApp's voice message transcription feature is reportedly still be developed for iOS. The messages will go to Apple but they'll stay encrypted since they won't be directly linked to the user's identity."
